definition: (used for transliteration)/old variant of 謳|讴[ou1]
Europe/abbr. for 歐洲|欧洲[Ou1 zhou1]/surname Ou
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

sentences.english: Tuesday's decision will prohibit UK courts from enforcing the ECJ's original ruling.
sentences.chinese: 星期二的決定將阻止歐洲法院執行其原來的裁決。

sentences.english: He is also hoping for a decision from the European court of first instance in 2010.
sentences.chinese: 他還希望歐洲法院在2010年進行初審。

sentences.english: The European court has now upheld these remedies.
sentences.chinese: 歐洲法院現在支持了這些救濟措施。
